project2

Class NBayes

  • java.lang.Object
    • project2.NBayes
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    nb

    public class NBayes
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the implementation of all Naive Bayes based operations.
    Author:
    Daniel Hollo

    • Method Detail

      • loadNBClassifierARFF

        public static void loadNBClassifierARFF(java.lang.String fName)
        Attempts to create a Naive Bayes Classifier from a given filename.
        Parameters:
        fName - Name of the file to attempt to create a NBClassifier from

      • loadNBClassifierCustom

        public static boolean loadNBClassifierCustom(java.lang.String fName,
                                             java.lang.String dfName)
        Load a previously saved classifier from file, as well as it's data file
        Parameters:
        fName - name of the file the classifier is saved in
        dfName - name of the data file the classifier was created from (for attribute labels)
        Returns:
        true if classifier loaded successfully; false if not

      • createInstanceInteractive

        public static void createInstanceInteractive(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Creates a new instance (case) from user input. Prompts user on valid inputs for each attribute and asks if this case should modify the classifier.
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner object to read in user input
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If an unexpected value is entered for an attribute
        weka.core.UnassignedDatasetException - If the dataset is not initalized

      • getAttributeValuefromUser

        public static java.lang.String getAttributeValuefromUser(java.util.Scanner sc,
                                                         weka.core.Attribute att)
        Prompts the user for the value of the given Attribute, displaying the valid inputs.
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner object to read in user input
        att - Attribute object that is to have it's value set by the user
        Returns:
        String containing the value given by the user for this Attribute
        See Also:
        createInstanceInteractive

      • getClassPrediction

        public static java.lang.String getClassPrediction(weka.core.Instance inst)
        Returns the most likely class by its name and its probability
        Parameters:
        inst - Instance object to have it's class determined
        Returns:
        Formatted string with the name of the most likely class and its probability

      • showAttributeInfo

        public static void showAttributeInfo(weka.core.Instances data)
        Displays all valid Attribute values for each Attribute of data
        Parameters:
        data - Instances object

      • showInstanceValues

        public static void showInstanceValues(weka.core.Instance data)
        Displays the Attributes and Attribute values for data
        Parameters:
        data - Instance object to be displayed
